comments.comment:
Hotfix:
Merged to master as 7bacef09622
Merged to release-1.14 as 63fa7d07452

As part of this ticket we have merged a code that just ignores new buffer size announcements if NetworkSequenceViewReader is not ready. However if that was a last buffer size adjustment for some period of time, this buffer size adjustment will be ignored and previous or default value will be still in use. FLINK-24328 will plan how to address this issue.
